en-US.summary: Find the pet that is just right for you.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask pet match for a recommendation
Alexa tell pet match that I want a big fluffy dog
en-US.name: Pet Match
en-US.description: Do you want a pet, but aren't sure what pet would be right for you? Pet Match will find the right pet for you by asking you a series of questions.
